Description of incident: The August 24 office theft of a hard drive resulted in the exposure of patient information.  No patient information was believed to have been exposed, but an investigation of the breach revealed that the hard drive had been stolen along with a laptop and a desktop computer.  It contained information from people who received Spectrum program services at the Westborough, Worcester, Milford, Framingham, Southbridge, Fitchburg, and Weymouth locations between 2002 and March of 2011.  Inpatient and outpatient names, Social Security numbers, diagnostic codes, medical insurance numbers, addresses, phone numbers, and dates of birth were exposed.
